sourcesContent:
User Login

Email is required
Email is not a valid
Password is required
Password Must be 5 characters
Password must contains one special character,one uppercase and one numeric
  New User ?  
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-userlogin', templateUrl: './userlogin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./userlogin.component.scss'] }) export class UserloginComponent { loginEmail:string=""; loginPassword:string=""; constructor(private route:Router,private http:HttpClient) {} submit(Login:any) { let bodyData={ "loginEmail":this.loginEmail, "loginPassword":this.loginPassword }; this.http.post("http://localhost:8080/registration/login",bodyData).subscribe((resultData:any)=> { console.log(resultData); if(resultData.message =="Email not exists") { alert("Email not exists"); } else if(resultData.message=="Login Success") { this.route.navigate(['/userdashboard']); } else { alert("Incorrect Email and and Paasword") } }) console.log(Login); } onRegister() { this.route.navigate(['/register']); } }
